sentences.en: Although rich in nutrition, brown rice is not palatable for direct eating.
sentences.cn: 糙米营养丰富, 直接炊煮食用有许多弊端.

sentences.en: But other ideas will be less palatable.
sentences.cn: 但是其它的一些想法将缺乏兴趣.

sentences.en: Life was possible, and at times even palatable.
sentences.cn: 日子能过得下去, 有时甚至还别有乐趣.

sentences.en: Most articles are certainly not palatable to a larger circle.
sentences.cn: 大多数文章谈不上适合更多人的胃口.

sentences.en: Mother provides palatable meals for our family every day.
sentences.cn: 母亲每天为家人烹制美味的三餐.

sentences.en: My advice may not be palatable, but they were sincerely meant.
sentences.cn: 我的劝告也许不令人愉快, 但用意却甚诚恳.

sentences.en: Robin's dishes are always highly palatable.
sentences.cn: 罗宾做的菜味道通常很棒!

sentences.en: Some patients find shohl's solution more palatable.
sentences.cn: 有些病人感到shohl氏溶液较为可口.

sentences.en: That option is not very palatable.
sentences.cn: 那个选择不太可以接受。

sentences.en: The more he thinks about it, the less palatable it becomes.
The palatable composite drink good flavor and rich nutrition was prepared.
sentences.cn: 经配制后形成酸甜适口,果香浓郁,色泽鲜亮,营养丰富的复合型果汁饮料.

sentences.en: There have been various attempts to remove this dualism, or make it more palatable.
sentences.cn: 人们曾作出各种努力来消除这种二元论, 或使它更合乎口味.

sentences.en: Where is the palatable milk? Where is the delicious bread?
sentences.cn: 美味的牛奶在哪里? 可口的面包在哪里?

trans.tran_cn: 可口的，美味的，宜人的，可接受的
trans.tran_en: palatable food or drink has a pleasant or acceptable taste
